datafield.subfield: 50 x 70 cm. or smaller, on 295 sheets 50 x 72 cm.
'Edited by Special Research Division 19 of the University of Tubingen supported by the Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft'.

Part A. Geography -- A I. Relief, Hydrology and Settlements (8 sheets) -- A II. Geology (7 sheets) -- A III. Geomorphology (8 sheets) -- A IV. Climate (5 sheets) -- A V. Hydrogeography (4 sheets) -- A VI. Vegetation/Fauna (21 sheets) -- A VII. Natural Regions (4 sheets) -- A VIII. Population (21 sheets) -- A IX. Settlement (16 sheets) -- A X. Economy and Communication (27 sheets) -- Part B. Ancient History -- B I. Stone Age (19 sheets) -- B II. Early and Middle Bronze Age (20 sheets) -- B III. Second Half of the 2nd Millenium BC (8 sheets) -- B IV. The First Millenium BC Down to the Time of Alexander the Great (25 sheets) -- B V. Hellenism and the Roman Periods (21 sheets) -- B VI. Late Antiquity (14 sheets) -- B VII. The Expansion of Islam up to the Time of the First Crusade (1096) (21 sheets) -- B VIII. From The Crusader Period up to 1510 (16 sheets) -- B IX. The Ottoman Period up to 1918 (17 sheets) -- B X. The Period Since The First World War (9 sheets) -- B S. Historical Maps (4 sheets).
General index to the atlas published as:

Tübinger Atlas des Vorderen Orients : Register zu den Karten = general index / bearbeitet von Beate Siewert-Mayer et al. [herausgegeben von Horst Kopp und Wolfgang Röllig]. 3 vols. Wiesbaden : Reichert, 1994.
Available in the library under call number DS44.96.T82.

DRAWER 3: folder 1: sheets AI-AII; folder 2: sheets AIII-AV; folder 3: sheets AVI. DRAWER 4: folder 4: sheets AVII; folder 5: sheets AVIII; folder 6: sheets AIX. DRAWER 7: folder 11a: sheets BIV 1-BIV 8; folder 11b: sheets BIV 9-BIV 23; folder 12: sheets BV. DRAWER 8: folder 13: sheets BVI; folder 14: sheets BVII; folder 15: sheets BVIII.
